title: MailBigFile
about:
MailBigFile, founded in 2005, is a web application that allows users to send large files that are too big for email.

As the lead for MailBigFile I am responsible for its day-to-day running, as well as any other tasks as necessary. These include database administration, server administration, customer support, code maintenance, product enhancement and more.
technical:
* PHP
   * Composer
* CSS
  * Bootstrap
* HTML
* JavaScript
  * npm
  * Webpack
* AWS (Amazon Web Services)
  * EC2
  * RDS
  * Elastic Beanstalk
  * PHP SDK
  * JavaScript SDK (for the Electron based app)
  * Cognito
  * Lambda
* Electron
* Uppy
* Plupload
* MySQL
* Linux (Ubuntu)
   * Apache
   * Fail2ban
resources:

* [Plupload](https://www.plupload.com/)
   * You can also see this on the [Free Service](https://free.mailbigfile.com)
* [Desktop App in Electron](https://www.mailbigfile.com/app)
